data.text: Godɨn Duam guizbangɨra kamaghɨn mɨgei, Dughiar Gɨn Izamim, gumazamizitaba uan nɨghnɨzir gavgaviba ategham. Egh me ifavarir duaba ko duar kurabar akaba baragh dar gɨn mangam.
Eghtɨ ifavarir gumaziba, me akar ifavaribar gumazamizibar sure damuam. Men arazir aghuibar gɨn mangamin nɨghnɨziba ariaghire mati avim dar isizɨ, me ua uan arazir aghuiba ko kurabagh fozir puvatɨ.

4:3 Jenesis 9:3; Rom 14:6; 1 Korin 8:8; 10:30-31; Kolosi 2:20-21; Hibru 13:4Me gumaziba amuiba ikian men anogoroke. Egha dagher God e bagha ingarizir maba, me ghaze ia dar aman markɨ. Dagher kaba, God ghaze, gumazamizir guizɨn akam gɨfogha nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an itiba, merara dagher kaba iniam. Me dagheba iniva dar amɨva God mɨnabagh.
4:4 Jenesis 1:31; Aposel 10:15; Rom 14:14; 14:20; 1 Korin 10:25; Taitus 1:15E fo, God ingarizir biziba bar, da bar dera. Ezɨ e bizir kurabar mɨn a dar ganan kogham. Puvatɨ. E God mɨnabagh da iniam.
E fo, e daghebar amɨsɨ, e God ko mɨgeir arazim ko Godɨn akamɨn gun mɨgeir arazim damutɨ, God arazir kamɨn daghebar amutɨ, da Godɨn bizibar mɨraram otogham.

Egh nɨ akar gavgavir kam Godɨn gumazamizibar anɨngɨva, nɨ Krais Iesusɨn ingangarir gumazir aghuimɨn ikiam. Egh nɨ, guizɨn akar e inigha nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an itim, ko fofozir aghuir nɨ gɨn zuiba, da nɨ damutɨ, tuavir kamɨn nɨ gavgavir ekiam iniam.
4:7 1 Timoti 1:4; 6:20; 2 Timoti 2:16; 2:23; Hibru 5:14Egh nɨ eghaghanir kɨniba ko eghaghanir kuraba akɨrim ragh dagh asaragh. Egh nɨ deravɨra Godɨn Arazibar sure damuam.

4:8 Onger Akaba 37:4; Matyu 6:33; Rom 8:28; Kolosi 2:23; 1 Timoti 6:6Nɨ fo, e uan mɨkarzibar amutɨ da gavgavighsɨ, e ingarɨva bizir maba sara damutɨ en mɨkarziba gavgavigham. Eghtɨ e Godɨn Arazibar sure damutɨ da en ikɨtɨ e gavgavigham, da bar en akurvaghvɨra ikiam. Egh da e datɨrɨghɨn itir ikɨrɨmɨrim ko ikɨrɨmɨrir gɨn iniamimɨn en akurvagham.
Ezɨ akar kam a bar guizbangɨra. Gumazamiziba bar a baraghɨva nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an ikiam.4:9 E fozir puvatɨ, a manmaghɨn mɨkɨmasa, “akar kam a guizbangɨra,” ves 8ɨn itir akam, o ves 10ɨn itir akam?

4:10 Onger Akaba 36:6; 1 Korin 4:11-12; 1 Timoti 2:3-4Godɨn ikia mamaghɨra itim, a gumazamiziba bar men Akurvazir Gumazim, an nɨghnɨzir ekiam kamakɨn, gumazamizir nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an itiba a men akuragham. E nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an ikia, bizir e fogha iniamiba bagha mɨzua iti. Kamaghɨn amizɨma, e zurara bar puvɨra ingari.
Nɨ gumazamiziba akar gavgavir kam me mɨkɨmɨva men sure damutɨ me dar gɨn mangɨ.

4:12 1 Korin 16:11; Taitus 2:7; 2:15; 1 Pita 5:3Marazi nɨn gara ghaze, nɨ gumazir igiam. Egh gumazitam kamaghɨn nɨ mɨkɨman markiam, kar gumazir kɨnim. Eghtɨ nɨ nɨghnɨzir gavgavim itiba bagh ababanimɨn uabɨ atɨgh. Egh arazir aghuibar amutɨ, me nɨn arazibar ganɨva, nɨn gɨn mangam. Nɨn arazir aghuibara kara: nɨn akar aghuiba, ko nɨn daroriba, ko nɨn arazir igharaz darazigh ifongezim, ko nɨghnɨzir gavgavimɨn arazim, ko Godɨn damazimɨn zuegha itir arazim.
Datɨrɨghɨn tugh mangɨ kɨ izamin dughiam, nɨ Godɨn Akɨnafarimɨn akabar gan me mɨkɨm, egh Godɨn akabar me mɨkɨn, egh dar mɨngarimɨn men sure damu, egh uan gavgavim isɨ ingangarir kabar anɨng.

4:14 Aposel 6:6; 8:17; 13:3; 19:6; 1 Timoti 1:18; 2 Timoti 1:6Nɨ fo, fomɨra siosɨn gumazamizir dapaniba uan dafariba isa nɨn dapanim garɨki. Ezɨ dughiar kamɨn, Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazir mam akamɨn gun nɨ mɨkeme, ezɨ tuavir kamɨn God bizir aghuimɨn mɨn uan gavgavim isa ingangarim bagha nɨ ganɨngi. Ezɨ kɨ nɨ mɨgei, nɨ gavgavir kam ataghɨraghan markɨ, nɨ a sara Godɨn ingangarim damuvɨra ikɨ.
Nɨ uan ingangarir kaba nɨ deravɨra dar gan. Egh nɨ bar uabɨ isɨ ingangarir kam danɨngɨva a damutɨ a deragh otogh. Eghtɨ gumazamiziba bar nɨn ingangarir arazibar gan fogham, da bar dera.

4:16 Aposel 20:28; Rom 11:14; 1 Korin 9:22; Jems 5:20Egh nɨ bar deragh uan arazibar ganɨva, uaghan nɨ gumazamizibar sure gamir ingangarimɨn gan. Nɨ kamaghɨn damu gavgavightɨma, tuavir kamɨn God nɨn akuragh, egh gumazamizir nɨn akam baraziba uaghan men akuragham.
